sentences.en: A mad rage possessed her.
sentences.cn: 她突然狂怒起来。

sentences.en: Campbell was found guilty of possessing heroin.
sentences.cn: 坎贝尔被判持有海洛因罪名成立。

sentences.en: Different workers possess different skills.
sentences.cn: 不同的工人拥有不同技能。

sentences.en: He is said to possess a fortune of more than two-and-a-half-thousand million dollars.
sentences.cn: 据说他拥有超出25亿美元的财富。

sentences.en: He no longer possessed the power to frighten her.
sentences.cn: 他再也吓不倒她了。

sentences.en: Its history is expressive of the character and development of the people who possess it.
sentences.cn: 它的历史体现了其拥有者的性格特征和发展过程。

sentences.en: Neither of them possessed a credit card.
sentences.cn: 他们两人都没有信用卡。

sentences.en: Only a few people possess the remotest idea of the facts.
sentences.cn: 只有少数人对这些事实粗知一二.

sentences.en: She pretends to various abilities she doesn't, in fact, possess.
sentences.cn: 她自称有种种她事实上并不具有的才能.

sentences.en: Some animals possess the characteristic of man.
sentences.cn: 有些动物具有人类的特征.

sentences.en: The analysis of what kind of temperament you possess is vital.
sentences.cn: 分析一下你有什么样的气质是十分重要的.

sentences.en: Their own lives already seemed to possess the symmetries of narrative art.
sentences.cn: 他们自己的生活似乎已经拥有叙事艺术的对称性。

sentences.en: They are crediting science with power it doesn't possess.
sentences.cn: 他们过分夸大了科学的力量。

sentences.en: They possess a formidable arsenal of rifles, machine guns, landmines and teargas.
sentences.cn: 他们持有的步枪、机枪、地雷和催泪弹数量惊人。

sentences.en: To possess wealth is not always to be happy.
sentences.cn: 拥有财富未必一定幸福.

sentences.en: Vowels possess greater sonority than consonants.
sentences.cn: 元音比辅音响亮.

sentences.en: We possess ten acres of plough.
sentences.cn: 我们拥有十英亩耕地.

sentences.en: what possessed you to come here?.
sentences.cn: 你让什么鬼上了身跑到这儿来了？。

sentences.en: What she does possess is the ability to get straight to the core of a problem.
sentences.cn: 她确实有直入问题本质的能力。

sentences.en: When held to the light the small oblong leaves are seen to possess tiny perforations.
sentences.cn: 迎着光看时，就会发现椭圆形小叶子上有微小的孔眼。

sentences.en: Writing calls for a critical attitude of mind that he did not possess.
sentences.cn: 写作需要有批判性思维，而这正是他所不具备的。

words.tran_cn: 占有的；所有的；所有格的；占有欲强的
拥有；财产；领地；自制；着迷

trans.tran_cn: 拥有，具备，控制，使言行失常
trans.tran_en: to have a particular quality or ability

trans.tran_cn: 占用， 拥有； 支配
trans.tran_en: to have a particular quality or ability
